subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador took the overall lead of the Vuelta a España by leading a Spanish sweep in the 13th stage. Contador finished the 130-mile stage in 5 hours 52 minutes 35 seconds. He leads Levi Leipheimer by 1:07 in the standings.
snippet: Alberto Contador took the overall lead of the Vuelta a España by leading a Spanish sweep in the 13th stage. Contador finished the 130-mile stage in 5 hours 52 minutes 35 seconds. He leads Levi Leipheimer by 1:07 in the standings.
